name: Ma'am, Is This Your Child?
description:
As a grocery store employee, part of your job is returning kids to their parents! When a parent appears at the front desk, you must find their kid using the description they give before time runs out, or its game over!

Developed for the Global Game Jam 2021!  https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/maam-your-child-9

Team Members:

  • Captain Kachara - Designer, UI Artist, Programmer - https://captain-kachara.itch.io/
  • Amanda Bahadori - Artist
  • James Doherty - Designer, Programmer - https://drslowpokephd.itch.io/
  • Marcus Williamson - Designer, Programmer - https://itch.io/profile/cheeseandrice
